## Publications in Google Scholar

```{r, eval=T}
scholar::get_publications('EgaGUCwAAAAJ') %>% 
  detailed_entries(
    what=title,
    when=year,
    with = author,
    where = journal,
    .protect=TRUE
  ) %>%
  arrange(desc(when))
```
